meanings.definition: To clean (something) by destroying harmful bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms.
meanings.sent1: I will disinfect the kitchen counter with a special spray.
meanings.sent2: Remember to disinfect your hands after touching dirty surfaces.
meanings.sent3: The superhero used a magical spray to disinfect the city from evil germs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a disinfecting light, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The disinfecting wipes worked like tiny warriors, battling the invisible enemies.

meanings.definition: To rid of infectious agents or germs.
meanings.sent1: She decided to disinfect the doorknobs to prevent the spread of germs.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff always disinfect the medical equipment thoroughly.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it could disinfect its toy mouse by licking it clean.
meanings.sent4: His laughter seemed to disinfect the gloomy atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The rain fell like a disinfecting shower, washing away all the dirt and grime.
